CustomField.description: "Ageing here is calculated on calendar days from Open cases - Today() - created date Closed case - resolved date - created date"
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Resolved"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Unresolved"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed Duplicate")), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ClosedDate)), DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 0 ), TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) )
CustomField.label: Ageing (Number Of Days)
